attributes.comment:
We are soliciting comments on the feasibility of a phased approach to implementation and potential opportunities to build stakeholder trust and adoption along the way:
•What entities or stakeholders should participate in the development of an NDH, and what involvement should they have?
oHealth IQ is a virtual marketing organization who helps seniors find the right Medicare plans to meet their needs. Most Virtual marketing organization use some enrollment platform that includes a provider search function. An important part of the needs analysis is finding a plan that has the necessary doctors and providers the individual needs. We rely on Health plan provider directory data which is imported into our platform to identify provider participation. The accuracy challenges can lead do choosing a plan with less benefits because another plan inaccurately did not reflect their doctor’s participation or enrolling into a plan where the data shows the doctor is participating but the data is old and the provider is no longer participating ot practicing at the identify location. These situations result in a poor customer experience and can lead to complaints to CMS.
oHealth IQ would be willing to be test partner of the API to see how it integrates with our enrollment platform
o
•What stakeholders could have valuable feedback in the scoping and early implementation processes to ensure viability of an NDH and sufficient uptake across the healthcare industry?
oVirtual marketing organizations
